author: Spencer Bailey
title: Bella Vista woman accused of practicing medicine without license | 5newsonline.com
text: SPRINGDALE, Ark. — A Northwest Arkansas woman has been arrested after allegedly using someone else's information to get local healthcare jobs despite not having a license or obtaining a medical degree. Alicia Flanagan, 55, of Bella Vista, was booked into the Washington County Jail on Thursday, April 25, 2024. According to online records, she is facing two counts of practicing medicine without a license and two counts of nonfinancial identity fraud. Nonfinancial identity fraud is a Class D felony, while practicing medicine without a license is a Class A misdemeanor. Court documents show that the warrant for Flanagan's arrest was first issued on Nov. 13, 2023. She was booked on Thursday at 10:40 a.m. She was released on a $10,000 bond at 12:19 p.m. An affidavit says that on June 6, 2023, the Director of Nurses for Springdale Health and Rehab called the Springdale Police Department (SPD) to report that a former employee, Flanagan, had been practicing medicine without a license. The director got a call from the Arkansas State Board of Nursing and was informed that Flanagan had been fraudulently using the credentials of Alicia Pierce, a nurse from Virginia, in order to get nursing jobs. Flanagan was employed at Springdale Health and Rehab under Pierce's credentials from Sept. 6, 2022, to Jan. 1, 2023, according to court documents. The State Board of Nursing was made aware of this when Flanagan applied for and started working at North Hills on May 4, 2023, using false credentials, the affidavit said. The nursing board then contacted Pierce, who reportedly had no idea her information was being used. Court documents note that Flanagan does not have a nursing license, and that while she did briefly go to college, she does not have a degree or certification. Flanagan admitted to working at Springdale Health and Rehab and not having a nursing license during an interview with detectives, the affidavit says. Arkansas State Board of Nursing records show that Flanagan was issued a cease and desist on Nov. 30, 2023, for being an unlicensed practitioner. 5NEWS reached out to Springdale Health and Rehab and got the following response from spokesperson Joe Perkins: “The lady in question worked for us for a relatively short period of time, and we discovered that her license was fraudulent. We reported the fraudulent license to the authorities, of course, and when we discovered that [fraud], we terminated the relationship with the lady. That was, I think, more than a year ago.” When asked how these kinds of things happen, Perkins said: “This person just had the appropriate credentials to create a fraud for a short period of time. Once again, we’re the ones that discovered the fraud.” Flanagan's next court date is scheduled for May 13. Watch 5NEWS on YouTube . Download the 5NEWS app on your smartphone: Stream 5NEWS 24/7 on the 5+ app: How to watch the 5+ app on your streaming device To report a typo or grammatical error, please email [KFSMDigitalTeam@tegna.com](mailto:KFSMDigitalTeam@tegna.com) and detail which story you're referring to.

author: Notimerica
title: Von der Leyen anuncia que el corredor marítimo para entregar ayuda a Gaza funcionará desde el domingo
text: BRUSELAS, 8 Mar. (EUROPA PRESS) - La presidenta de la Comisión Europea, Ursula von der Leyen, ha apuntado este viernes desde Nicosia que el corredor marítimo anunciado por Estados Unidos para entregar ayuda humanitaria a la Franja de Gaza desde Chipre entrará en funcionamiento desde el domingo, tras una primera operación piloto este mismo viernes. En declaraciones junto al presidente chipriota, Nikos Christodoulides, la líder del Ejecutivo europeo ha confirmado la apertura de un corredor humanitario por vía marítima a iniciativa de Chipre, Emiratos Árabes, Estados Unidos y la Comisión Europea, permita con la que se quiere potenciar la entrega de ayuda humanitaria a la Franja frente al bloqueo israelí de los pasos terrestres, en especial en Rafá. "Estamos cerca de abrir el corredor, esperamos que sea este domingo, y estoy contenta de ver que una operación piloto se lanzará hoy", ha indicado la conservadora alemana que ha informado que esta primera acción tiene lugar a través de World Central Kitchen, la organización humanitaria del chef español José Andrés. Igualmente, Von der Leyen ha alabado el liderazgo de Nicosia para poner en marcha esta iniciativa, asegurando que Chipre siempre ha sido un "puente" entre Europa y Oriente Próximo e iniciativas como esta "demuestran este papel histórico". La intención de establecer un corredor humanitario por mar fue adelantada este jueves por el presidente de Estados Unidos, Joe Biden, justo antes de su discurso del Estado de la Unión. La iniciativa es respaldada por otros socios de la comunidad internacional como Reino Unido, cuyo ministro de Exteriores, David Cameron, ha confirmado que Londres participará en el corredor marítimo para hacer llegar ayuda directamente a Gaza. "Seguimos instando a Israel a que permita la entrada de más camiones en Gaza como la forma más rápida de hacer llegar la ayuda a quienes la necesitan", ha instado en una llamada a Tel Aviv.

author: Rabbi Marc Gellman
title: The God Squad: A cup of kindness for auld lang syne this year
text:
This is a carousel. Use Next and Previous buttons to navigate
3
1 of 3 auld lang syne.
Dreamstime Show More Show Less
2 of 3 Rabbi Marc Gellman
God Squad Show More Show Less 3 of 3 My New Year’s prayer for you, dear readers, is a prayer for any year but this one. The wars in Ukraine and Gaza are only the lead prayers in our worldwide litany of woe. Let us agree to gather on New Year’s Eve with hope in our hearts that the year ahead will be kinder to humans on planet Earth than the year that has just come to its exhausted end.
Of course, it was not the year that was not kind to us, it was us who were not kind to us. Which leads me to the musical plea “let’s take a cup of kindness now” embedded in everyone’s favorite New Year’s song, "Auld Lang Syne."
The history of "Auld Lang Syne" is not widely known. Even those who know that the famous Scottish poet Robert Burns wrote the text in 1788 do not know that Burns wrote it based upon an even older Scottish folk song.
According to the Wikipedia summation of all things knowable, “The poem's Scots title may be translated into standard English as "old long since" or, less literally, "long, long ago," "days gone by," "times long past" or "old times." Consequently, "For auld lang syne," as it appears in the first line of the chorus, might be loosely translated as "for the sake of old times."
So, the meaning buried in the Scottish Gaelic of Burn’s poem/song is that we should not forget old friendships just because they may be strained in the bad weather of modern civilization.
I am thinking of the long friendships between Arabs and Jews from the seventh century until the 16th century when Jews were welcomed into the Islamic empire from Arabia to Spain. When Jews were persecuted by Christians in Europe, Jews like Maimonides attained high positions in Muslim society. When Jews were expelled from Christian Spain in 1492, we were warmly welcomed into Muslim Turkey by the Sultan. The works of all the Greek philosophers were translated from Greek into Arabic by the Muslim philosophers called the Mutakallimun. Those centuries preserved the legacy of ancient Greece until the Renaissance took them up in Europe again.
The period of time the Jewish community lived in Muslim Spain was so glorious it was called the Golden Age of Spanish Jewry. Modern geopolitics and the founding of the State of Israel have obviously strained these historic ties of faith and friendship, but now, above all other times, we must remember them especially when we fall into the understandable despair of the present moment.
Personally, I hope we can also take to heart the meaning of this emotional and heartfelt song that fills our homes at the stroke of midnight. If we live long enough, we all will experience old friendships that have worn thin over time. Let us also take a cup of kindness yet and try to remember and revitalize these old friendships. My experience is that most friendships die through simple inadvertence and not through bitter acrimony. For no good reason we just lose track of those we used to love. Perhaps this year we can get back to the task of enfolding old friends in the love of our lives.
This year will be an election year and auld lang syne is particularly relevant for our nation as we enter an election cycle. There were days of old when political rivals and competing political ideologies did not produce caustic vituperation and slanderous invective. We can, as the old saying goes that is not a song, disagree without being disagreeable. The key is a cup of kindness.
Most Popular There are several new laws in Connecticut for 2024. Here's what to know A former Hamden shooting range used to test lethal weapons. Now it's being turned into a healing garden These are some of the staff changes to Connecticut's local TV stations in 2023 10+ things for Connecticut food lovers to do in January Here are 10 license plates you won’t see on the road in CT These businesses are expected to open in Connecticut in 2024 So, whether or not the song evokes historical or political or personal memories of the good old days, let us remember them together and let us sing together:
Should old acquaintance be forgot,
and never brought to mind?
Should old acquaintance be forgot,
and auld lang syne?
Chorus
For auld lang syne, my dear,
for auld lang syne,
we'll take a cup of kindness yet,
for auld lang syne.
And surely you'll buy your pint cup!
and surely I'll buy mine!
And we'll take a cup o' kindness yet,
for auld lang syne.
Chorus
We two have run about the hills,
and picked the daisies fine;
But we've wandered many a weary foot,
since auld lang syne.
Chorus
We two have paddled in the stream,
from morning sun till dine;
But seas between us broad have roared
since auld lang syne.
Chorus
And there's a hand my trusty friend!
And give me a hand o' thine!
And we'll take a right good-will draught,
for auld lang syne.
Chorus
Happy New Year!
Send ALL QUESTIONS AND COMMENTS to The God Squad via email at godsquadquestion@aol.com. Rabbi Gellman is the author of several books, including “Religion for Dummies,” co-written with Fr. Tom Hartman. Also, the new God Squad podcast is now available.

author: 小浪财讯
title: 中光防雷跌6.68%，成交额4.80亿元，近5日主力净流入-2.17亿|中光防雷_新浪财经_新浪网
text:
8月14日， 中光防雷 跌6.68%，成交额4.80亿元，换手率11.04%，总市值44.21亿元。
异动分析
军工+无人机+高铁+5G+华为概念
1、雷电防护行业领先企业;公司已经建立了较为完善的军工业务运行体系,专门负责国防建设领域的雷电防护技术与产品应用推广与市场开发,形成专有系列的产品序列和技术应用环境;公司为武器装备科研生产三级保密资格单位。
2、2023年7月25日互动易问答：公司研制的信号射频电磁脉冲防护模块及电源SPD配置无人机机房，公司和无人机企业有合作。
3、2023年7月25日互动易：公司全资子公司铁创科技目前和高铁有合作。
4、2019年半年报披露：公司凭借多年通信设备防雷产品配套服务，与客户形成协同效应，已成功导入通信产品的磁性器件应用，已通过通信客户的磁性器件测试以及系统测试，随5G通信产品的应用，5G产品与4G产品对高功率磁性器件的需求成倍级的增长，公司产品的技术优势和成本优势在行业中会获得更大的市场份额。
5、2019年4月互动平台回复称公司之前一直专注于通信行业的防雷专业及市场，为爱立信、华为、中兴、诺基亚等通信设备制造商配套防雷产品
(免责声明：分析内容来源于互联网，不构成投资建议，请投资者根据不同行情独立判断)
资金分析
今日主力净流入-7070.61万，占比0.15%，行业排名72/89，连续3日被主力资金减仓；所属行业主力净流入-48.56亿，当前无连续增减仓现象，主力趋势不明显。
区间 今日 近3日 近5日 近10日 近20日 主力净流入 -7070.61万 -1.65亿 -2.17亿 -2.94亿 -3.64亿
主力持仓
主力轻度控盘，筹码分布较为分散，主力成交额2.30亿，占总成交额的11.82%。
技术面：筹码平均交易成本为15.14元
该股筹码平均交易成本为15.14元，近期筹码快速出逃，建议调仓换股；目前股价在压力位14.86和支撑位12.37之间，可以做区间波段。
公司简介
资料显示，四川中光防雷科技股份有限公司位于四川省成都高新区西部园区天宇路19号，成立日期2004年2月18日，上市日期2015年5月13日，公司主营业务涉及防雷产品的研发、生产和销售,防雷工程的设计和安装,提供防雷产品和防雷工程一体化的整体解决方案。铁路行业防雷领域的业务。主营业务收入构成为：防雷产品71.60%，非防雷产品23.65%，防雷工程及服务4.75%。
中光防雷所属申万行业为：通信-通信设备-其他通信设备。所属概念板块包括：电感、军民融合、航天军工、华为概念、融资融券等。
截至3月31日，中光防雷股东户数1.78万，较上期减少11.19%；人均流通股17613股，较上期增加12.59%。2025年1月-3月，中光防雷实现营业收入8544.71万元，同比增长12.72%；归母净利润281.05万元，同比减少8.41%。
分红方面，中光防雷A股上市后累计派现9878.11万元。近三年，累计派现1336.68万元。
机构持仓方面，截止2025年3月31日，中光防雷十大流通股东中，金元顺安元启灵活配置混合（004685）位居第九大流通股东，持股118.07万股，为新进股东。中邮军民融合灵活配置混合A（004139）退出十大流通股东之列。
风险提示：市场有风险，投资需谨慎。本文为AI大模型自动发布，任何在本文出现的信息（包括但不限于个股、评论、预测、图表、指标、理论、任何形式的表述等）均只作为参考，不构成个人投资建议。

author: christel88p
title: Treadmill Under Desk Uk: The Ugly Truth About Treadmill Under Desk Uk
text:
Treadmills Under Desk UK
Treadmills under desk uk can be an effective tool for anyone struggling to move enough throughout the daytime. They might not be suited for everyone, especially those who have balance issues or those who use mobility devices.
This model is specifically designed for walking and comes with an array of useful features, including the ability to hold devices, remote control, easy-to-read display screen and Bluetooth connectivity.
Walking is a gentle exercise
Walking is a great method to burn calories and improve your health. It is particularly beneficial if you are trying to lose weight or keep your healthy lifestyle. Running is more effective than walking in terms of burning calories. Additionally it is also a great method to improve your endurance and endurance.
Many people opt to use treadmills under desks in the UK in order to achieve their fitness goals while working at their desks. They are typically designed to fit under your desk or under tables and are quiet enough so that you can work in peace without being disruptive to others in the office. They also have a display that clearly displays your workout progress and fitness information.
The majority of under-desk machines are flat and are designed for seamless integration into your workspace. They provide a level surface to jog or walk on and can support up 350lbs of weight capacity for the user. When not in use they can be easily assembled and put away in a corner or closet. They are also portable and can be used in different locations such as hotels, apartments and houses.
These treadmills are usually priced under $1,000, which makes them a cost-effective and practical option to increase your daily steps while balancing the demands of your job. However it is essential to keep in mind that they don’t have an incline feature, and you should be aware of this prior buying one. In addition to this, they are not recommended for people who have balance issues, those who is undergoing cardiac investigations, or individuals who use mobility aids.
In addition to the physical benefits, treadmills under desks can also help improve focus, concentration and productivity in the workplace. They are an excellent solution for those who are sedentary for long periods of time. However, they shouldn’t be used as a substitute for outdoor activities. The fresh air and being outdoors is a vital part of maintaining a healthy lifestyle.
Take a look at the WalkingPad X21 if you’re looking for a lightweight, portable under-desk treadmill. It is a model with advanced folding technology that allows the treadmill to fold into a compact size after 180 degrees. It also has a slim footprint which makes it easy to put in an under-seat drawer or under the couch. It is the ideal choice for home-based professionals.
It’s simple for anyone to use
Even those who aren’t used to exercising will be able to use the best treadmills that are under desks. They’re quiet and portable and allow you to exercise and burn calories without disturbing anyone else. They also come with a variety of features that make them more practical, including Bluetooth connectivity and built-in desks. These features can be a huge help for those who are new to exercising and can boost the motivation of those who are already exercising.
The Urevo is one of the best under desk treadmills. The treadmill is small and can be tucked under your desk. It also has a transport wheel to make it easy to move. It also comes with a premium motor that’s extremely quiet and comes with five layers of shock absorbers. You can easily change between walking, jogging, and training modes at the touch of the button. The treadmill that is under your desk is very affordable and comes with all the necessary components.
Another treadmill under the desk that is easy to use is the Walden WT302. The walking standing desk pad is small under desk treadmill , versatile, and easy to operate. Its ultra-quiet (less than 55DB) motor makes it ideal for the office, while its large LED screen allows you to track progress in real time. It will also show you how many calories you’ve burned and how long your journey is.
The under-desk treadmill by CitySports is among the cheapest models available on the market. It’s light and folds down easily and allows you to put it in a cupboard or under your desk. The LCD display is easy to read and you can connect your smartphone with Bluetooth. It also has a desk attachment that can hold laptops and other things.
Under-desk treadmills are a great way to stay fit when you work, despite their high cost. They are also great for preventing back discomfort, which can be caused by sitting for long periods of time. Before you purchase an under-desk treadmill make sure that it meets your needs and is compatible with your current workspace. If you are unsure consult an expert at your local gym or fitness centre.
It’s easy to store it.
Under desk treadmills can help maintain your fitness and overall health whether you work at your home or in an office. Recent research has shown that sitting for too long can cause serious health problems, so adding a small treadmill underneath your workstation could be a good way to stay healthy and burn calories while working. An under desk treadmill desk attachment allows you to exercise as you work. It’s also quiet and easy for you to store.
The UREVO treadmill under desk is among the top options available. It is designed to fit under a majority of desks, and is light enough to move from one location to another. In addition, it has an LED screen that displays your speed distance, time, and distance. You can pick from various workout settings.
The CitySports ultra-slim walking pad treadmill is another fantastic option. The treadmill under your desk is easy to use and features an elegant design. Its simple screen shows your progress and is compatible with the KS Fit app that can be used to customize your exercise routine. Its slim design means it can be easily moved from room to room, and it can fit under your desk making it a great option for those with limited storage space.
The GOPLUS under desk treadmill is an affordable option for those who want to exercise while working. It’s not as sophisticated as some of the more expensive models, however it’s a good option for those looking to exercise while working. This treadmill is very quiet so you won’t bother your neighbors or coworkers.
When purchasing an under-desk treadmill, think about the maximum weight capacity and stability of the machine. In general, these treadmills aren’t as robust as fitness treadmills, and therefore they typically have a lower weight limit and less stability. You may need to choose a larger model if you have a large household. This is especially important if you are living in a small house, apartment or dorm.
It’s quiet
Under desk treadmills have become increasingly popular. They’re a great choice to exercise while working. It’s crucial to pick the best treadmill for your requirements. Some of these treadmills are quite expensive. There are a few inexpensive treadmills available on the market. A treadmill in your office can help ease back pain, increase energy and help you burn calories. The best part is that you can do all this without having to leave your desk.
The Urevo is the most sought-after treadmill that is under the desk. It has an incredibly compact design and a quiet motor. It can handle 250lbs in weight and comes with wheels for effortless transportation. It also has a “bee nest” that is a unique shock absorber, that provides comfort to your knees. The treadmill under the desk is extremely light and produces only 45DB of sound when running at full speed.
Cozybrite is a different option. It is among the best looking in the market and is a fantastic choice for anyone who is looking to purchase an under-desk treadmill that’s practical and stylish. It comes with wheels and can be moved around your home or office. It’s also powered by a 2HP premium motor that is extremely quiet. It is very powerful and beats most other treadmills in its price range.
In addition to being quiet, treadmills under desks are also user-friendly. Many of them feature displays that let you see your workout data and track your progress as you’re working out. Some models come with Bluetooth connectivity, which means you can connect to your smartphone to stream music or exercise.
Although walking is a low-impact method of exercise, it’s not appropriate for all. Discuss with your doctor in case you suffer from heart disease or diabetes prior to using an exercise treadmill under your desk. Also, you’ll need to ensure you have a safe spot to stand in while you exercise. Otherwise, you’ll have a hard to stay balanced.
